      static String getPropertyWithDeprecationWarning​(Properties properties, String expectedKey, String defaultValue, String deprecatedKey)
      Tries to get a value from the given properties first using the expectedKey.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public static Properties filter​(Properties properties,
                                String prefix)
        Return new Properties, which contains only the properties starting with a given prefix.
        Parameters:
        properties - properties to be filtered
        prefix - prefix
        Returns:
        new filtered Properties

      • filterAndCut

        public static Properties filterAndCut​(Properties properties,
                                      String prefix)
        Return new Properties, which contains only the properties starting with a given prefix, stripped from that prefix.
        Parameters:
        properties - properties to be filtered
        prefix - prefix
        Returns:
        new filtered and stripped Properties

      • getPropertyInt

        public static int getPropertyInt​(Properties properties,
                                 String key,
                                 int defaultValue)
        Returns the value for the given key from the given Properties and converts it to an integer.
        Parameters:
        properties - The Properties to read from.
        key - The key to read from the properties.
        defaultValue - The default value to be used either when the key does not exists or the value could not be converted to an integer.
        Returns:
        The property's value as integer.

      • getPropertyLong

        public static long getPropertyLong​(Properties properties,
                                   String key,
                                   long defaultValue)
        Returns the value for the given key from the given Properties and converts it to a long value.
        Parameters:
        properties - The Properties to read from.
        key - The key to read from the properties.
        defaultValue - The default value to be used either when the key does not exists or the value could not be converted to a long.
        Returns:
        The property's value as long.

      • getPropertyBool

        public static boolean getPropertyBool​(Properties properties,
                                      String key,
                                      boolean defaultValue)
        Returns the value for the given key from the given Properties and converts it to a boolean.
        Parameters:
        properties - The Properties to read from.
        key - The key to read from the properties.
        defaultValue - The default value to be used when the key does not exists.
        Returns:
        The property's value as boolean. Any string different from true (ignoring case) will return false.

      • getPropertyWithDeprecationWarning

        public static String getPropertyWithDeprecationWarning​(Properties properties,
                                                       String expectedKey,
                                                       String deprecatedKey)
        Same #as getPropertyWithDeprecationWarning(Properties, String, String, String) using null as default value.
        Parameters:
        properties - The Properties to read from.
        expectedKey - The actually expected key.
        deprecatedKey - The deprecated key to try in case the expectedKey does not exists.
        Returns:
        The value associated with either key, or null if not found.

      • getPropertyWithDeprecationWarning

        public static String getPropertyWithDeprecationWarning​(Properties properties,
                                                       String expectedKey,
                                                       String defaultValue,
                                                       String deprecatedKey)
        Tries to get a value from the given properties first using the expectedKey. If not found, the deprecatedKey is tried. If still not found, the given defaultValue is returned.
        If a value was found using the deprecatedKey, an according deprecation warning is logged.
        Parameters:
        properties - The Properties to read from.
        expectedKey - The actually expected key.
        defaultValue - The default value to return if the neither the expectedKey nor the deprecatedKey was found.
        deprecatedKey - The deprecated key to try in case the expectedKey does not exists.
        Returns:
        The value associated with either key, or the given default.
